FuncDef: This command enables domain name manipulation of the user name, such as append, strip, replace or add as default.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the user name manipulations with respect to domain name values. Values-append-domain - appends an "@" delimiter with the specified domain-name at the end of the user-name, independent if a domain name was already present.
Specifies the domain name string to be used in the specified operation, up to 128 characters.
